TwinEditor.Sharing.BootstrappingState

TwinEditor.Sharing.BootstrappingState Class Reference

Will bootstrap a session. This currently does not do much besides screaming "HI" at each other, but it might be used in the future to:

  • Make sure application versions are compatible
  • Agree on a synchronization strategy
  • Check password information.
More...

List of all members.

Protected Member Functions

override void ApplicationConnectionReceived (object sender, ReceivedEventArgs e)

Detailed Description

Will bootstrap a session. This currently does not do much besides screaming "HI" at each other, but it might be used in the future to:

  • Make sure application versions are compatible
  • Agree on a synchronization strategy
  • Check password information.

Member Function Documentation

override void TwinEditor.Sharing.BootstrappingState.ApplicationConnectionReceived ( object  sender,
ReceivedEventArgs  e 
) [protected, virtual]

<inheritdoc>

Handles the following events:

  • "HI 0" Initial handshake

  • "HI 1" Second handshake. Afer receiving this, we will change to the Initializationtate.

Reimplemented from TwinEditor.Sharing.SessionState.
